name: Lightning Warfare
game_info: +3 [ICON_MOVES] Movement for Great Generals. Armor units gain +15% attack, +1 [ICON_MOVES] Movement and ignore enemy ZOC.
historical_info: Lightning Warfare, better known by the German term blitzkrieg, is a strategy that concentrates motorized forces to create a high-speed breakthrough of an enemy's lines. Using combined arms and tactical air power, Lightning Warfare seeks to keep an enemy off-balance, penetrating deep into the rear and attacking units flanking the breakthrough. Pioneered by Heinz Guderian and perfected by Erich von Manstein and Erwin Rommel, so effective was the blitzkrieg in Poland, France and Russia that the Soviet Union and Western Allies adopted it to ultimately defeat Nazi Germany.

branch.name: Autocracy
branch.game_info: Autocracy is for militaristic civilizations, dreaming of world conquest.Adopting Autocracy reduces Unit Gold Maintenance costs by 33%, allowing an empire to field a larger military. Receive 10 Culture as plunder for each point of Culture produced in the captured city.Adopting all Policies in the Autocracy tree will grant a 25% attack bonus to all Military Units for 50 turns.May purchase Great Generals and Great Admirals with Faith.[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]This branch cannot be active at the same time as Freedom or Order.
